heroDescription: Effortlessly calculate your monthly student loan payments and see a detailed amortization schedule. Make informed financial decisions about your education financing.
enterLoanInfo: Enter your student loan information below.
detailsAppearHere: Your student loan details will appear here.
fillFormToStart: Fill out the form to get started.
loanCostBreakdown: A breakdown of your student loan costs over time.
summaryBasedOn: Based on a loan of {{loanAmount}} at {{interestRate}}% over {{loanTerm}} years.
monthByMonthBreakdown: The month-by-month breakdown of your loan payments.
calculationErrorDescription: Could not calculate payment. Please check your inputs.
loanAmountErrorDescription: The calculated loan amount must be positive. Please ensure the total course fee is greater than your personal funds.
